title: Virginia race gives midterm messaging a test run
description: Larry Sabato, the Director of the UVA Center for Politics and the Editor in Chief of the Crystal Ball, plus Nathan Gonzales, the editor and publisher off Inside Elections, talk with Chuck about the tight race in Virginia.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
